body.name: Baby Toy Cars for 1 2 3+ Year Old Toddler, City Guard Series Press and Go, Pull Back Vehicle with Soft Plush Car Mat, Educational Gift for Kids, Boys and Girls
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 21 mins
features: 【City Guard Series】The cars set included Ranger Police, Engineer, Police, Environmental Protection, Doctor, Fire Brigade. 6 cute cars with bright colors and amazing design that attract baby’s attention. They are chunky and good for little hands to grasp, provide endless hours of fun and excitement for children of all ages

【Press and Go & Pull Back Cars with Play Mat】They were a total HIT! 2 ways to play, press down the head of baby car toys, or pull back the car, then release, the car will go forward. No battery needed. Energy saving and environmental friendly. They are also compact and come with play mat which make cars easy to play and store

【Safe for Baby & Durable】Our toy cars are built to last, made from high-quality materials that can withstand even the most enthusiastic play. These cars feature a press and release mechanism that allows your child to send them zooming across the room with ease. The smooth and easy-to-use action of our toys ensures that even younger children can enjoy the thrill of racing their cars across the floor

【Play to Learn】Our press to go toy cars are also great for developing important skills, such as hand-eye coordination, motor skills, and cognitive development. Plus, playing with our toys can spark your child's imagination and creativity, encouraging them to come up with their own exciting stories and adventures

【Satisfaction Guarantee】They're perfect for Birthdays, Holidays, Christmas, New Year’s, Thanksgiving, Easter, and any other occasion, or just because. Providing a 100% satisfaction experience is our main priority to our customers. Feel free to message us through “Contact Sellers” if products don't meet your expectations. The celebrations start at Zero Zoo!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose our press and go car toys for babies & toddlers? We know how important it is to develop our child’s practical abilities while at the same time, having fun with them with the time it’s left from our daily jobs.We know how important it is to develop our child’s practical abilities while at the same time, having fun with them with the time it’s left from our daily jobs.Experience parent-child interaction and education, develop the child's independent personality, promote practical abilities and thinking abilities. Press Go & Pull Back Cars Press the car, then release, the car will go forward.Pull the toy car back, then the car go fast. Suitable for playing indoors and outdoors.No need battery, with smooth surface and flexible rubber wheels, convenient and interesting for kids. Meet the City Guard Toys Play is essential to development because it contributes to the cognitive, physical, social, and emotional well-being of children and youth.Play also offers an ideal opportunity for parents to engage fully with their children.Supports parents and children use different role cars to play, exercise children's hands-on ability and competitive awareness. It is an ideal toys set to enhance the relationship.

What Will The Kids Received? 6 different role play toy cars are included in the box: Ranger Police Toy Car*1Engineer Toy Car*1Police Toy Car*1Environmental Protection Toy Car*1Doctor Toy Car*1Fire Brigade Toy Car*1Play Mat*1

Eye-catching Colors The colors are bright and vivid, and the role play characters are so cute, the kids will surely like it when they first see them, they will enjoy endless of fun.The cars are round and chunky but in the perfect size, they are easy for little hands to grasp, and kids can take them everywhere or put in pocket for outing.Different shapes and colors of toy cars help baby to recognize new thing and stimulate their visual development. Sturdy and Durable High quality ABS durable.material, vivid color, no smell, Reusable and easy to clean.Built to survive from drops and falls without breaking or cracking, kids can be bold to play.Let baby's curiosity take itself to develop exploration ability, learn to recognize and identify shapes and colors Ideal Gifts For More Occasion Excellent party favor or a winning prize at a themed party.It's a great birthday present, home decoration, travel toys, party favors, festival gift toys for boys and girls.There is no doubt that Zero Zoo play car toys are wonderful gift idea you can feel good about giving your kids!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Safe, fun, and well loved
reviews.reviewText: Bought these cars for my daughter and she loves them. The vibrant colors are eye catching and the easy to grasp shape is perfect fit for her little hands. The construction is durable. They don't roll the greatest on high pile carpet but work equally as well as a push car vs using the built in spring driven motor. My child loves playing with these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toy that will grow with my baby!
reviews.reviewText: We LOVE this toy! It has helped my 9 month old baby learn cause and effect, communicate that he wants help, and how to push down. We even started working on action words "ready, set...go" with this toy. It is easy to store with the bag it comes in and I love that it will grow with my baby. Being able to open up the bag to use as a racing track is truly a gift. I could not recommend this toy more. For the price, quality, and endless fun, it truly is a no brainer!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Introduced this toy to my daughter at 9 months and we’re still obsessed with it. So simple and easy to use. Granted it doesn’t work on carpet, so that’s something to note. However they’re so cute and can be used for play/learning in so many ways. This is something that will grow with your kids, so if you’re like me and don’t want to constantly be buying new toys - this is the perfect item to add to your toy rotation. I always toss a car in my purse for on the go play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a blast!!
reviews.reviewText: These cars are really fun. Lining them all up and racing them against each other is a blast.Oh yea and my son likes them too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect toddler toy!!
reviews.reviewText: Our toddler loves playing with these cars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute little cars
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my son when he was 11 months old. He hasn't quite got the purpose behind them just yet. But he likes watching me play with them when I push the head down the car takes off. Which makes him excited. I'm sure once he gets a little older these will become very entertaining for him. The toys are good quality and don't seem to pose any risks for young babies.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent quality cars that really GO!
reviews.reviewText: These cars are lightweight but seem fairly sturdy. Unfortunately I received two duplicate cars - two of the black police car and no blue car. The printing is fairly clear, though the names and abbreviations printed on them will be a little unclear for most American kids. Most importantly, they roll nicely when just pushed, or you can push the head down with a bit of force to make them propel themselves - fun! They really do go fast and FAR, both on carpet and hard floors. Despite what the product details say, they don't go when pulled back, just when the head is pushed down.The mat does have a bit of an odor when first brought out of the box. It's quite thin, but a nice way to store the cars together. It has velcro on the sides to make it into a little tote bag, but no Velcro across the top to actually seal the cars in. You can use the cars on the mat for imaginative play, but they go a lot farther than it is long when pushed! It has buildings to match to the themes of each vehicle, but again, the abbreviations (FB for fire brigade, RP for the police, EP for sanitation?, etc.) won’t be meaningful to American kids.Overall, a fun toy just for the cars themselves - kids will have a blast with them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's a really great product for your money. Their is so much to do and the little characters are so cute and adorable. They are the perfect size for little hands and big enough to not fit in the mouth of the Littles.
